title: pros and cons
content: Whats are the pros and cons of pes rr campus if you're staying in hostel? Any advice would be helpful too.

comments.body:
Pros : Location (Right inside campus) , laundry , mess , opportunity to make more friends 

Cons : Strict curfew timings , wifi(speed is pretty good but most of the "non-educational" stuffs are blocked on it ) , shitty management , mess( there are a total of 3 messes and hardly one of them is decent ) , drinking water(Have faced a lot of issues with it but you will get adjusted to it).

My advice : Although there are a lot of cons if you get good roommates the journey does get a lot smoother. 
Also maintain a good repo with the management people and bouncers .

If you have any other doubts you can dm me .

Adding to this: Worst case there are a lot of PGs and apartments filled with PES students near campus. If you don't like hostel you can move out after a year (or sooner if you're desperate and can make the necessary arrangements)

Youtube runs on a restricted version in which most of the videos and recommendations are blocked .
Reddit afaik videos are blocked on it.
